page.title: 07WESTHAMPNETT
page.content: The Coach Raod from Shopwyke leads past the Westhampnett Water Park which is an old Gravel Pit now used for Sail Boarding and Sailing, then past the Amenity tip where people can dispose of rubbish, until it joins the A27 on the North East of Chichester. {Westhampnett}is mostly on the A27. At the roundabout is the Chichester Lodge Hotel with 43 bedrooms and this is next to the White Swan public house. One exit from the roundabout leads to Goodwood and here can be found the Charta Furniture Factory and Old Place Farm. The River Lavant runs past the Factory and the Hotel. A bridge leads over the river to the Hotel. (written by Michael). The A27 leads from the Chichester Lodge Hotel towards Arundel and Worthing. This is where to find our village. On the right is Hall and
